resources.string: Instructions: MyRecipe allows you to create and save unique recipes and sort them into different categories for easy access. To Create a new recipe navigate to the add recipe page using either the toolbar or the navigation/back buttons Fill out the corresponding info for your recipe including the description, ingredients list, photo, and relevant categories like dinner/lunch/other press create and it will add the recipe to the corresponding tags you selected. You can view these recipes by navigating to the view recipes page and selecting the corresponding category to view all the recipes listed under that category
